title: import from desktop, the camera shows blank screen
creator: IamFubar
content: I try to import from my desktop version but the camera does not show anything but a blank screen (yes I authorized the camera use). I have even attempted to use the File Select to import but it fails with an error stating it cannot be found. Also, I cannot use POP3 mail for Gmail as it gives an authentication error every time. It only allows IMAP use but I do not like IMAP.
metadata: ;os:Android;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; CrOS x86_64 14541.0.0) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/138.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

title: Thunderbird for Android not fetching emails
creator: dnmoscato
content: Suddenly after the last update of beta 11.0b5 thunderbird suddenly stopped fetching my gmail. Checked settings everything fine. Don't really want to do a reinstall.
